verbose_text: Fig. XREF_FIG E shows that TGFbeta1 repressed the promoter activity of wild-type but not the mutant reporter, suggesting that lncRNA-LET is a downstream target of the canonical TGFbeta signaling pathway.
evidence: TGFbeta1 repressed the promoter activity of wild-type but not the mutant reporter, suggesting that lncRNA-LET is a downstream target of the canonical TGFbeta
